release.name: v1.0.0
release.body:
Install the Arcus.Templates packages that you need via NuGet, for instance [Arcus.Templates.WebApi](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Arcus.Templates.WebApi/1.0.0): ```shell > dotnet new --install Arcus.Templates.WebApi::1.0.0 ``` For a complete list of all Arcus.Templates packages see the [documentation](https://templates.arcus-azure.net/). ## What's new? ### Features * Provide the capability to create an EventHubs worker project template with integrated message pump (#680) * Provide the capability to create an Azure Functions EventHubs trigger project template (#681) * Provide the capability to create isolated/in-process Azure Functions EventHubs trigger projects * Provide the capability to exclude Serilog from the Azure Functions EventHubs trigger project * Provide the capability to create isolated Azure Functions Service Bus topic trigger projects (#414) * Provide the capability to track requests in the Azure Functions HTTP trigger project template (#312) * Provide the capability to exclude Serilog from the Azure Functions HTTP trigger project template (#598) * Provide the capability to exclude Serilog from the Azure Functions Databricks job metrics project template (#597) * Provide the capability to navigate automatically towards the Swagger UI page when OpenAPI is enabled in the Web API project template (#694) ### Fixes / Changes * Provide a default `ARCUS_HTTP_PORT` to the Web API project template (#683) * Assign correlation information to telemetry context in Azure Functions HTTP trigger project template to support service-to-service correlation (#612) * Use dedicated API health report model to omit exception details from the public HTTP endpoint (#600) * Use Application Insights connection string instead of instrumentation key in all project templates (with exception of in-process Azure Functions) (#594) * Updates all project templates with Observability v2.5 (#623) * Streamline Serilog default log verbosity to `Information` (#624) * Remove the OpenAPI-specific files in the Azure Functions HTTP trigger project template when the OpenAPI is excluded (#616) ## Changes: * f74d1ffb394d57780cfe3ccec6896872560f65fc feat: add exclude serilog project option to az func databricks jobmetrics project template (#687) * ae28413759abc6dad255a10455d2dcf60d48deab chore: add launchUrl to webapi project template (#695) * 9d72d5bdae683cd2f85f2baa942e87330c264d58 chore(deps): bump nth-check and @slorber/static-site-generator-webpack-plugin (#693) * b15bf8825135e5ff63c2b89afab65f1ff02c3175 chore(deps): update dependency microsoft.azure.functions.worker.extensions.servicebus to v5.7.0 (#692) * fc395b56a9de15b875c4ba7bedfd99cd7adb3bc4 chore(deps): update dependency microsoft.azure.functions.worker to v1.10.0 (#691) * afb9b6a9014e818ed6ff05deb3f2e7fbd8501676 docs: add introduction page (#689) * 9b2378a2fd18302089c9580302dc6337b310e560 chore(deps): update dependency arcus.security.providers.azurekeyvault to v1.8.1 (#690) * a98001ec7a0207b44dd52121a9271ec0fd70b32c feat: add az func eventhubs project template (#686) * 959fd9520522eaf9e034a95ffbee49a65484f06f feat: add isolated az func servicebus topic project option (#685) * fa7ae9743654ac049b70a2d612b962893077d00b chore(deps): update dependency microsoft.net.test.sdk to v17.3.2 (#688)

release.body:
Install the Arcus.WebApi packages that you need via NuGet, for instance [Arcus.WebApi.Security](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Arcus.WebApi.Security/1.7.0-preview-2):
```shell
PM > Install-Package Arcus.WebApi.Security --Version 1.7.0-preview-2
```
For a complete list of all Arcus.WebApi packages see the [documentation](https://webapi.arcus-azure.net/).
## What's new?

* Provide the capability to do something (#123)
### Fixes / Changes
None.

None.

None.

release.name: v1.3.0
release.body:
Install the Arcus.Messaging packages that you need via NuGet, for instance [Arcus.Messaging.Pumps.ServiceBus](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Arcus.Messaging.Pumps.ServiceBus/1.3.0): ```shell PM > Install-Package Arcus.Messaging.Pumps.ServiceBus --Version 1.3.0 ``` For a complete list of all Arcus.Messaging packages see the [documentation](https://messaging.arcus-azure.net/). ## What's new? ### Features * Provide the capability to handle messages from Azure Event Hubs in a message pump (#24, #323, #324, #326, #335) * Provide the capability to send correlated Azure Service Bus messages (#309) * Provide the capability to send correlated Azure Event Hubs event messages (#324) * Provide the capability to track Azure Service Bus requests in the Azure Service Bus message pump (#221) * Provide the capability to create `ServiceBusMessage` instances with a fluent builder (#269) * Provide the capability to create `EventData` instances with a fluent builder (#324) * Provide the capability to route messages in .NET 6 Azure Functions (#249) * Provide the capability to retrieve the operation parent ID from the message correlation extension (#269) ### Fixes / Changes * Use custom `HealthReport` for TCP health probe that doesn't include exception details (#287) ### Breaking Changes None. ### Removal None. ## Changes: * acfaf3ecd30333238fdb3d1e717725ca6f32dd9f feat: add eventhubs request tracking (#335) * b75dcf1b2eccb997d49bf386050ad0513e7e4f50 docs: remove table of contents (#336) * 2bf9aae80312649214c072713a8e6e148033ab8b fix: use general correlation model in sender extensions (#334) * 598b4df1f7c92235634bf9be514b3dc1f4e9401d feat: add eventhubs message router options (#332) * b88b45006e72a3bfd23620d1b0d1eaf6d8177407 test: add eventhubs docker integration test (#322) * ae653a6b8a9b0ae65d6af8a588283967026d663c feat: add telemetrycontext in sender correlation options (#328) * 15f6bdfa1d3c87c379144037bbcbf29d28aea324 feat: add dependency tracking event producing (#325) * 7b6f7f9a725fad9794805981d0a82cb50186e744 feat: add eventhubs messagehandler overloads (#323) * 00783d3ea4c8b3112adb210d19f54f9b3f8a99db feat: add request tracking az servicebus general routing (#319) * 3eedd16db475e106de7d5f759bb7d193632f30d4 chore: fix typo in xml code docs on secret store ref (#329)

release.body:
Install new version via [PowerShell Gallery](https://www.powershellgallery.com/packages?q=Arcus.Scripting.ARM) ```shell PS > Install-Module -Name Arcus.Scripting.All --Version 0.6.0 ``` ## What's new? ### Features * Provide script to signup or invite a new user in Azure API Management (https://github.com/arcus-azure/arcus.scripting/pull/316) * Provide script to remove a user from Azure API Management (https://github.com/arcus-azure/arcus.scripting/pull/321) ### Fixes / Changes * Added context validation for Azure API Management for better error handling (https://github.com/arcus-azure/arcus.scripting/pull/317) * Fixed a bug in the `Import-AzApiManagementApiPolicy`, `Import-AzApiManagementOperationPolicy` and `Import-AzApiManagementProductPolicy` commands where the execution was erroneously marked as failed when in actuality it succeeded (https://github.com/arcus-azure/arcus.scripting/pull/324) * Fixed the casing of `PolicyFilePath` parameter in the `Import-AzApiManagementApiPolicy` command (https://github.com/arcus-azure/arcus.scripting/pull/324) ### Breaking Changes None. ### Removal None. ## Changes: * 36a72e7091ae47485cec8cd34af60299ccbf0546 fix: fixed casing of parameter and fixed return param of Set-AzApiManagementPolicy command (#324) * 2c31e34253796767db9132ac97502caa86c7dfcc feat: Add Remove-AzApiManagementUser script (#321) * bd26e4197dad847b101fcc0dde4726230306ffdc feat: Add APIM context validation (#317) * 8d9d6fdf96d689a49828358a9e5302591eccd467 feat: Add Create-AzApiManagementUser script (#316) * 34d33fdbb8501a586b58a7e476c1b4744a38adad Chore(deps): bump terser from 4.8.0 to 4.8.1 in /docs (#315) * f63deca218ea006e1d50781b99d51ca1dd1bdeb6 docs: add introduction section (#313) * 958b2ddbc8b4ac189b0b848e142bb65261410a3a test: simplify arm integration tests (#312) * 4cff9714b135eb822ab4a79f4dcf828855c9310c Chore(deps): bump eventsource from 1.1.0 to 1.1.1 in /docs (#311) * 0c0ae15863c8e173a22ba093b36f5d00dce27adf chore: improve local pester test runs (#310) * b75f132e6be8537d2e28b2be44f68829b66aedc6 test: add logic apps integration tests (#308)
See More * 7d8586e40d6c23333242308d1f57df6d9d18d92a chore: update readme w/ available modules (#306) * 692898e163a06023e6983327ea817c19a5e23179 chore: update release notes w example (#301) * a8bf46dfefe55809f3107d55ee8ff5d0019cfa9e Chore(deps): bump algoliasearch-helper from 3.6.0 to 3.8.2 in /docs (#304) * c7a3d8edf11e7a5a912f6ca7cc5e8ef2fa2c3ba6 Chore(deps): bump async from 2.6.3 to 2.6.4 in /docs (#303) * d31a8fb842e9d2d580981c171d814977b0b407de Chore(deps): bump cross-fetch from 3.1.4 to 3.1.5 in /docs (#302) * b092076dbb7057cea6c4511076a3a181c4b2356d chore: update copyright and add project url (#300) * 497fd6d57e108ac8ee61f50db486f997698f14b0 docs: fix az management title in feature docs (#297) * 67f72c952614efd891023ef683992fa5c9af4582 Chore(deps): bump shelljs from 0.8.4 to 0.8.5 in /docs (#295) * 7f04fac50e33c7e36b03ba6e43946faa0be73606 Chore(deps): bump follow-redirects from 1.14.1 to 1.14.9 in /docs (#294) * 21e6ad582a5665b25ec2136ec741d616ad67099b Chore(deps): bump prismjs from 1.25.0 to 1.27.0 in /docs (#293) * e5e2cbc9560d2d3972573bceec3202d1965bf088 Chore(deps): bump url-parse from 1.5.3 to 1.5.10 in /docs (#289) * c21227001d34d4c318aa7fa13326d29d3b56c15c Chore(deps): bump axios from 0.21.1 to 0.21.4 in /docs (#290) * 61b2ad1c8cca293d50e96759b826b98d13b8af32 Chore(deps): bump nanoid from 3.1.23 to 3.3.2 in /docs (#291) * 030dd4e5d9a754e15d1c432f88c2985d4b2d5c5f fix: update with remaining v0.6 feature docs (#292) * 8f458ab5f30061f57e5b0139a1bea5f1bfb6f2f4 added docs for version 0.6.0 (#288) This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/codit/Arcus/_build/results?buildId=63890&view=logs).

release.name: v1.6.1
release.body:
Install the Arcus.WebApi packages that you need via NuGet, for instance [Arcus.WebApi.Security](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Arcus.WebApi.Security/1.6.1):

## What's new?
### Fixes / Changes
* Re-add operation ID to HTTP response with HTTP correlation enabled (#365)
* Add missing telemetry context to support Azure Functions HTTP correlation tracking (#370)
* Use traces for diagnostic HTTP correlation messages (#372)

## Changes:

* 306fc33b7337afe7289f30d95d9f399390d26316 (❗) feat: add telemetry context to http client correlation options (#371)
* 2d4eeb34653ac65c154d9427d76a088a7d3c61e2 chore: update missing request id warning to trace (#372)
* 05b9cb06e175d57358594dc999ffdde5fae5ca1a feat: add operation id to http response (#367)
* dd00dbb978779510bb49aa1b7324d1c1c403089a chore: Bump terser from 4.8.0 to 4.8.1 in /docs (#364)
* ade9f6dca3aaff89a4377d33de4fabbd3b63b71c fix: update w correct sample package (#363)
* 51260d571091f81b3bb7da20e70ce707f27b3d31 docs: publish v1.6 feature docs (#362)

payload.description: Web API development with Microsoft Azure in a breeze.

release.name: v1.0.0
release.body:
Install the Arcus.Templates packages that you need via NuGet, for instance [Arcus.Templates.WebApi](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Arcus.Templates.WebApi/1.0.0): ```shell > dotnet new --install Arcus.Templates.WebApi::1.0.0 ``` For a complete list of all Arcus.Templates packages see the [documentation](https://templates.arcus-azure.net/). ## What's new? ### Features * Provide the capability to create an EventHubs worker project template with integrated message pump (#680) * Provide the capability to create an Azure Functions EventHubs trigger project template (#681) * Provide the capability to create isolated/in-process Azure Functions EventHubs trigger projects * Provide the capability to exclude Serilog from the Azure Functions EventHubs trigger project * Provide the capability to create isolated Azure Functions Service Bus topic trigger projects (#414) * Provide the capability to track requests in the Azure Functions HTTP trigger project template (#312) * Provide the capability to exclude Serilog from the Azure Functions HTTP trigger project template (#598) * Provide the capability to exclude Serilog from the Azure Functions Databricks job metrics project template (#597) * Provide the capability to navigate automatically towards the Swagger UI page when OpenAPI is enabled in the Web API project template (#694) ### Fixes / Changes * Provide a default `ARCUS_HTTP_PORT` to the Web API project template (#683) * Assign correlation information to telemetry context in Azure Functions HTTP trigger project template to support service-to-service correlation (#612) * Use dedicated API health report model to omit exception details from the public HTTP endpoint (#600) * Use Application Insights connection string instead of instrumentation key in all project templates (with exception of in-process Azure Functions) (#594) * Updates all project templates with Observability v2.5 (#623) * Streamline Serilog default log verbosity to `Information` (#624) * Remove the OpenAPI-specific files in the Azure Functions HTTP trigger project template when the OpenAPI is excluded (#616) ## Changes: * f74d1ffb394d57780cfe3ccec6896872560f65fc feat: add exclude serilog project option to az func databricks jobmetrics project template (#687) * ae28413759abc6dad255a10455d2dcf60d48deab chore: add launchUrl to webapi project template (#695) * 9d72d5bdae683cd2f85f2baa942e87330c264d58 chore(deps): bump nth-check and @slorber/static-site-generator-webpack-plugin (#693) * b15bf8825135e5ff63c2b89afab65f1ff02c3175 chore(deps): update dependency microsoft.azure.functions.worker.extensions.servicebus to v5.7.0 (#692) * fc395b56a9de15b875c4ba7bedfd99cd7adb3bc4 chore(deps): update dependency microsoft.azure.functions.worker to v1.10.0 (#691) * afb9b6a9014e818ed6ff05deb3f2e7fbd8501676 docs: add introduction page (#689) * 9b2378a2fd18302089c9580302dc6337b310e560 chore(deps): update dependency arcus.security.providers.azurekeyvault to v1.8.1 (#690) * a98001ec7a0207b44dd52121a9271ec0fd70b32c feat: add az func eventhubs project template (#686) * 959fd9520522eaf9e034a95ffbee49a65484f06f feat: add isolated az func servicebus topic project option (#685) * fa7ae9743654ac049b70a2d612b962893077d00b chore(deps): update dependency microsoft.net.test.sdk to v17.3.2 (#688)

release.name: v1.3.0
release.body:
Install the Arcus.Messaging packages that you need via NuGet, for instance [Arcus.Messaging.Pumps.ServiceBus](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Arcus.Messaging.Pumps.ServiceBus/1.3.0): ```shell PM > Install-Package Arcus.Messaging.Pumps.ServiceBus --Version 1.3.0 ``` For a complete list of all Arcus.Messaging packages see the [documentation](https://messaging.arcus-azure.net/). ## What's new? ### Features * Provide the capability to handle messages from Azure Event Hubs in a message pump (#24, #323, #324, #326, #335) * Provide the capability to send correlated Azure Service Bus messages (#309) * Provide the capability to send correlated Azure Event Hubs event messages (#324) * Provide the capability to track Azure Service Bus requests in the Azure Service Bus message pump (#221) * Provide the capability to create `ServiceBusMessage` instances with a fluent builder (#269) * Provide the capability to create `EventData` instances with a fluent builder (#324) * Provide the capability to route messages in .NET 6 Azure Functions (#249) * Provide the capability to retrieve the operation parent ID from the message correlation extension (#269) ### Fixes / Changes * Use custom `HealthReport` for TCP health probe that doesn't include exception details (#287) ### Breaking Changes None. ### Removal None. ## Changes: * acfaf3ecd30333238fdb3d1e717725ca6f32dd9f feat: add eventhubs request tracking (#335) * b75dcf1b2eccb997d49bf386050ad0513e7e4f50 docs: remove table of contents (#336) * 2bf9aae80312649214c072713a8e6e148033ab8b fix: use general correlation model in sender extensions (#334) * 598b4df1f7c92235634bf9be514b3dc1f4e9401d feat: add eventhubs message router options (#332) * b88b45006e72a3bfd23620d1b0d1eaf6d8177407 test: add eventhubs docker integration test (#322) * ae653a6b8a9b0ae65d6af8a588283967026d663c feat: add telemetrycontext in sender correlation options (#328) * 15f6bdfa1d3c87c379144037bbcbf29d28aea324 feat: add dependency tracking event producing (#325) * 7b6f7f9a725fad9794805981d0a82cb50186e744 feat: add eventhubs messagehandler overloads (#323) * 00783d3ea4c8b3112adb210d19f54f9b3f8a99db feat: add request tracking az servicebus general routing (#319) * 3eedd16db475e106de7d5f759bb7d193632f30d4 chore: fix typo in xml code docs on secret store ref (#329)

Install the Arcus.Security packages that you need via NuGet, for instance [Arcus.Security.Providers.AzureKeyVault](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Arcus.Security.Providers.AzureKeyVault/1.8.0): ```shell PM > Install-Package Arcus.Security.Providers.AzureKeyVault --Version 1.8.0 ``` For a complete list of all Arcus.Security packages see the [documentation](https://security.arcus-azure.net/). ## What's new? ### Features * Provide support for versioned secrets in the secret store (#354) ### Fixes / Changes None. ### Breaking Changes None. ### Removal None. ## Changes: * 09b39438df2f23ef9a5c4801861884684f031cfe docs: upgrade secret store diagram (#359) * 29775bf5631c70d5ee50d85e59017e5c077a0685 docs: correct az func secret store docs (#362) * f3b42d290f77c59d43586bbb37b152f665a2aa88 feat: add secret version support (#358) * edf5ef5057fd2cb58efa9f7d36715819d8560760 test: remove temporary tested stored az keyvault secret (#356) * 93e3ec1666cc2098d2ca41ca1b3fc2310a587f0f fix: update w/ correct pointers in user guide (#355) * 4eddb8ef87a7acaabce9b388f8123a239b2a2358 chore: Bump terser from 4.8.0 to 4.8.1 in /docs (#353) * 107bb04494779dee8978c7380ed3410bf174eccb docs: add az keyvault user guide (#352) * 641a6f746f26e67365ef27bca1c22a368a92a3ad chore: use new az keyvault dependency tracking (#351) * 5796263f83798a7d9020f9d2b6d8526fa8b0b0e9 docs: improve welcome page and sidebar (#350) * f5ca3948a95c2f5f7a6f4ef460dfe73d89a7b646 chore: Bump eventsource from 1.1.0 to 1.1.1 in /docs (#349)

release.name: v2.6.0
release.body:
Install the Arcus.Observability packages that you need via NuGet, for instance [Arcus.Observability.Telemetry.Serilog.Sinks.ApplicationInsights](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Arcus.Observability.Telemetry.Serilog.Sinks.ApplicationInsights/2.6.0): ```shell PM > Install-Package Arcus.Observability.Telemetry.Serilog.Sinks.ApplicationInsights --Version 2.6.0 ``` For a complete list of all Arcus.Observability packages see the [documentation](https://observability.arcus-azure.net/). ## What's new? ### Features * Provide support for Azure EventHubs request telemetry tracking (#437) * Provide support for custom request telemetry tracking (#438) * Provide support for isolated Azure Functions HTTP request telemetry tracking (#443) * Provide support for custom correlation property names configuration in Azure Application Insights Serilog sink (#409) ### Fixes / Changes * Add operation name to make SQL dependency more unique (#419) * Use solely Azure Service Bus entity name as target name in Service Bus dependency tracking (#445) * Use `LogCustomMetric` for metric telemetry tracking to avoid ambiguous signatures (#280) * Deprecate the too-specific correlation options when registering general correlation accessor (#418) ### Breaking Changes None. ### Removal None. ## Changes: * 59846d43737c179261d5676a711c483e6a88786e (❗) docs: fix webapi userguide correlation ids (#465) * 4ce8d00c1d17bfdc57128c96fc28fb2a9a6dd991 (❗) chore: rework correlation info options (#462) * 6ca2c4dd630d021fa48bc8dc09f2c5c010ba9005 (❗) chore: update w/o invalid operation exception throwal (#461) * 542301c4637163f4694e1b2901537a3c418af02b (❗) fix: add operation name to sql dependency tracking (#460) * 2bc33b95279349046849c8ea6040c352a8b78121 docs: add service-to-service correlation web api user guide (#446) * 8e2da8bb9eafeca77b785c5888d04f875d685f9d fix: null-check on scalar value (#459) * e192925f10be88f51d2151eacac9b2fd3df47303 feat: track http request data in http trigger (#448) * 68bd4593991d6b974c4d7c6881c34da3faa924c2 feat: track custom request (#447) * a4fc90d06b0cd668cd289245130f5410eec10ecb docs: use new sql dependency approach (#451) * b7410c9caba11b0ddd98d88d5b6e1eea69db38e4 docs: improve appinsights user guide w/ az func (#452)
See More * a5e7d75997a62f6092d1c7b8b37cd0b3ad749ea4 docs: appinsights secret store connectionstring in aspnetcore userguide (#450) * b2c0b0d7e03ba771f2ee38e93e1e0c2f61e304d8 (❗) fix: servicebus entityname as dependency targetname (#445) * 5245b779a74bfe0209925c83d7c2d846c7f2a794 chore: bump terser from 4.8.0 to 4.8.1 in /docs (#442) * c6a16eb30f59af8b78ad7f5eb634374bdf273558 feat: add eventhubs request tracking (#439) * 188fa1ac5360f4600a509c7292e42498b7864f41 feat: add telemetry context tracking for general traces/exceptions (#436) * 2c24ca0f314e4e7288efd60e8f662c05754ccca1 test: add unit test for remove micro app insights extension (#435) * 268efd28b61eb8247b657b06cea4de9cc35dd7e4 feat: Ambiguous method definition on LogMetric (#424) * c94c6b01ee0842b7d5cab399e9cc28c8cf8b4d51 feat: add configurable serilog sink correlation options (#425) * 1a3900b25980fc9b46230893dc2d5f854ee58bed fix: use correct deprecation az servicebus messages (#427) * 6041e6aff670090705e5db148a5a06920e3f3b6d docs: place guides above features (#426) * fef9766f50ae44c990cc06138a7301bb266be212 test: simplify integration tests (#414) * 1374feccd966d55d66e3395d2cfdd829656a9672 docs: publish v2.5 feature docs (#416) This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/codit/Arcus/_build/results?buildId=64103&view=logs).

release.name: v0.7.0
release.body:
Install new version via [PowerShell Gallery](https://www.powershellgallery.com/packages?q=Arcus.Scripting.ARM) ```shell PS > Install-Module -Name Arcus.Scripting.All --Version 0.6.0 ``` ## What's new? ### Features * Provide script to signup or invite a new user in Azure API Management (https://github.com/arcus-azure/arcus.scripting/pull/316) * Provide script to remove a user from Azure API Management (https://github.com/arcus-azure/arcus.scripting/pull/321) ### Fixes / Changes * Added context validation for Azure API Management for better error handling (https://github.com/arcus-azure/arcus.scripting/pull/317) * Fixed a bug in the `Import-AzApiManagementApiPolicy`, `Import-AzApiManagementOperationPolicy` and `Import-AzApiManagementProductPolicy` commands where the execution was erroneously marked as failed when in actuality it succeeded (https://github.com/arcus-azure/arcus.scripting/pull/324) * Fixed the casing of `PolicyFilePath` parameter in the `Import-AzApiManagementApiPolicy` command (https://github.com/arcus-azure/arcus.scripting/pull/324) ### Breaking Changes None. ### Removal None. ## Changes: * 36a72e7091ae47485cec8cd34af60299ccbf0546 fix: fixed casing of parameter and fixed return param of Set-AzApiManagementPolicy command (#324) * 2c31e34253796767db9132ac97502caa86c7dfcc feat: Add Remove-AzApiManagementUser script (#321) * bd26e4197dad847b101fcc0dde4726230306ffdc feat: Add APIM context validation (#317) * 8d9d6fdf96d689a49828358a9e5302591eccd467 feat: Add Create-AzApiManagementUser script (#316) * 34d33fdbb8501a586b58a7e476c1b4744a38adad Chore(deps): bump terser from 4.8.0 to 4.8.1 in /docs (#315) * f63deca218ea006e1d50781b99d51ca1dd1bdeb6 docs: add introduction section (#313) * 958b2ddbc8b4ac189b0b848e142bb65261410a3a test: simplify arm integration tests (#312) * 4cff9714b135eb822ab4a79f4dcf828855c9310c Chore(deps): bump eventsource from 1.1.0 to 1.1.1 in /docs (#311) * 0c0ae15863c8e173a22ba093b36f5d00dce27adf chore: improve local pester test runs (#310) * b75f132e6be8537d2e28b2be44f68829b66aedc6 test: add logic apps integration tests (#308)

release.body:
Install the Arcus.WebApi packages that you need via NuGet, for instance [Arcus.WebApi.Security](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Arcus.WebApi.Security/1.6.1):

## What's new?
### Fixes / Changes
* Re-add operation ID to HTTP response with HTTP correlation enabled (#365)
* Add missing telemetry context to support Azure Functions HTTP correlation tracking (#370)
* Use traces for diagnostic HTTP correlation messages (#372)

payload.description: Web API development with Microsoft Azure in a breeze.

release.name: v1.0.0
release.body:
Install the Arcus.Templates packages that you need via NuGet, for instance [Arcus.Templates.WebApi](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Arcus.Templates.WebApi/1.0.0): ```shell > dotnet new --install Arcus.Templates.WebApi::1.0.0 ``` For a complete list of all Arcus.Templates packages see the [documentation](https://templates.arcus-azure.net/). ## What's new? ### Features * Provide the capability to create an EventHubs worker project template with integrated message pump (#680) * Provide the capability to create an Azure Functions EventHubs trigger project template (#681) * Provide the capability to create isolated/in-process Azure Functions EventHubs trigger projects * Provide the capability to exclude Serilog from the Azure Functions EventHubs trigger project * Provide the capability to create isolated Azure Functions Service Bus topic trigger projects (#414) * Provide the capability to track requests in the Azure Functions HTTP trigger project template (#312) * Provide the capability to exclude Serilog from the Azure Functions HTTP trigger project template (#598) * Provide the capability to exclude Serilog from the Azure Functions Databricks job metrics project template (#597) * Provide the capability to navigate automatically towards the Swagger UI page when OpenAPI is enabled in the Web API project template (#694) ### Fixes / Changes * Provide a default `ARCUS_HTTP_PORT` to the Web API project template (#683) * Assign correlation information to telemetry context in Azure Functions HTTP trigger project template to support service-to-service correlation (#612) * Use dedicated API health report model to omit exception details from the public HTTP endpoint (#600) * Use Application Insights connection string instead of instrumentation key in all project templates (with exception of in-process Azure Functions) (#594) * Updates all project templates with Observability v2.5 (#623) * Streamline Serilog default log verbosity to `Information` (#624) * Remove the OpenAPI-specific files in the Azure Functions HTTP trigger project template when the OpenAPI is excluded (#616) ## release.body:
Install the Arcus.Messaging packages that you need via NuGet, for instance [Arcus.Messaging.Pumps.ServiceBus](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Arcus.Messaging.Pumps.ServiceBus/1.3.0): ```shell PM > Install-Package Arcus.Messaging.Pumps.ServiceBus --Version 1.3.0 ``` For a complete list of all Arcus.Messaging packages see the [documentation](https://messaging.arcus-azure.net/). ## What's new? ### Features * Provide the capability to handle messages from Azure Event Hubs in a message pump (#24, #323, #324, #326, #335) * Provide the capability to send correlated Azure Service Bus messages (#309) * Provide the capability to send correlated Azure Event Hubs event messages (#324) * Provide the capability to track Azure Service Bus requests in the Azure Service Bus message pump (#221) * Provide the capability to create `ServiceBusMessage` instances with a fluent builder (#269) * Provide the capability to create `EventData` instances with a fluent builder (#324) * Provide the capability to route messages in .NET 6 Azure Functions (#249) * Provide the capability to retrieve the operation parent ID from the message correlation extension (#269) ### Fixes / Changes * Use custom `HealthReport` for TCP health probe that doesn't include exception details (#287) ### Breaking Changes None. ### Removal None. ## Changes: * acfaf3ecd30333238fdb3d1e717725ca6f32dd9f feat: add eventhubs request tracking (#335) * b75dcf1b2eccb997d49bf386050ad0513e7e4f50 docs: remove table of contents (#336) * 2bf9aae80312649214c072713a8e6e148033ab8b fix: use general correlation model in sender extensions (#334) * 598b4df1f7c92235634bf9be514b3dc1f4e9401d feat: add eventhubs message router options (#332) * b88b45006e72a3bfd23620d1b0d1eaf6d8177407 test: add eventhubs docker integration test (#322) * ae653a6b8a9b0ae65d6af8a588283967026d663c feat: add telemetrycontext in sender correlation options (#328) * 15f6bdfa1d3c87c379144037bbcbf29d28aea324 feat: add dependency tracking event producing (#325) * 7b6f7f9a725fad9794805981d0a82cb50186e744 feat: add eventhubs messagehandler overloads (#323) * 00783d3ea4c8b3112adb210d19f54f9b3f8a99db feat: add request tracking az servicebus general routing (#319) * 3eedd16db475e106de7d5f759bb7d193632f30d4 chore: fix typo in xml code docs on secret store ref (#329)

release.body:
Install the Arcus.Observability packages that you need via NuGet, for instance [Arcus.Observability.Telemetry.Serilog.Sinks.ApplicationInsights](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Arcus.Observability.Telemetry.Serilog.Sinks.ApplicationInsights/2.6.0): ```shell PM > Install-Package Arcus.Observability.Telemetry.Serilog.Sinks.ApplicationInsights --Version 2.6.0 ``` For a complete list of all Arcus.Observability packages see the [documentation](https://observability.arcus-azure.net/). ## What's new? ### Features * Provide support for Azure EventHubs request telemetry tracking (#437) * Provide support for custom request telemetry tracking (#438) * Provide support for isolated Azure Functions HTTP request telemetry tracking (#443) * Provide support for custom correlation property names configuration in Azure Application Insights Serilog sink (#409) ### Fixes / Changes * Add operation name to make SQL dependency more unique (#419) * Use solely Azure Service Bus entity name as target name in Service Bus dependency tracking (#445) * Use `LogCustomMetric` for metric telemetry tracking to avoid ambiguous signatures (#280) * Deprecate the too-specific correlation options when registering general correlation accessor (#418) ### Breaking Changes None. ### Removal None. ## Changes: * 59846d43737c179261d5676a711c483e6a88786e (❗) docs: fix webapi userguide correlation ids (#465) * 4ce8d00c1d17bfdc57128c96fc28fb2a9a6dd991 (❗) chore: rework correlation info options (#462) * 6ca2c4dd630d021fa48bc8dc09f2c5c010ba9005 (❗) chore: update w/o invalid operation exception throwal (#461) * 542301c4637163f4694e1b2901537a3c418af02b (❗) fix: add operation name to sql dependency tracking (#460) * 2bc33b95279349046849c8ea6040c352a8b78121 docs: add service-to-service correlation web api user guide (#446) * 8e2da8bb9eafeca77b785c5888d04f875d685f9d fix: null-check on scalar value (#459) * e192925f10be88f51d2151eacac9b2fd3df47303 feat: track http request data in http trigger (#448) * 68bd4593991d6b974c4d7c6881c34da3faa924c2 feat: track custom request (#447) * a4fc90d06b0cd668cd289245130f5410eec10ecb docs: use new sql dependency approach (#451) * b7410c9caba11b0ddd98d88d5b6e1eea69db38e4 docs: improve appinsights user guide w/ az func (#452)

release.name: v0.7.0
release.body:
Install new version via [PowerShell Gallery](https://www.powershellgallery.com/packages?q=Arcus.Scripting.ARM) ```shell PS > Install-Module -Name Arcus.Scripting.All --Version 0.6.0 ``` ## What's new? ### Features * Provide script to signup or invite a new user in Azure API Management (https://github.com/arcus-azure/arcus.scripting/pull/316) * Provide script to remove a user from Azure API Management (https://github.com/arcus-azure/arcus.scripting/pull/321) ### Fixes / Changes * Added context validation for Azure API Management for better error handling (https://github.com/arcus-azure/arcus.scripting/pull/317) * Fixed a bug in the `Import-AzApiManagementApiPolicy`, `Import-AzApiManagementOperationPolicy` and `Import-AzApiManagementProductPolicy` commands where the execution was erroneously marked as failed when in actuality it succeeded (https://github.com/arcus-azure/arcus.scripting/pull/324) * Fixed the casing of `PolicyFilePath` parameter in the `Import-AzApiManagementApiPolicy` command (https://github.com/arcus-azure/arcus.scripting/pull/324) ### Breaking Changes None. ### Removal None. ## Changes: * 36a72e7091ae47485cec8cd34af60299ccbf0546 fix: fixed casing of parameter and fixed return param of Set-AzApiManagementPolicy command (#324) * 2c31e34253796767db9132ac97502caa86c7dfcc feat: Add Remove-AzApiManagementUser script (#321) * bd26e4197dad847b101fcc0dde4726230306ffdc feat: Add APIM context validation (#317) * 8d9d6fdf96d689a49828358a9e5302591eccd467 feat: Add Create-AzApiManagementUser script (#316) * 34d33fdbb8501a586b58a7e476c1b4744a38adad Chore(deps): bump terser from 4.8.0 to 4.8.1 in /docs (#315) * f63deca218ea006e1d50781b99d51ca1dd1bdeb6 docs: add introduction section (#313) * 958b2ddbc8b4ac189b0b848e142bb65261410a3a test: simplify arm integration tests (#312) * 4cff9714b135eb822ab4a79f4dcf828855c9310c Chore(deps): bump eventsource from 1.1.0 to 1.1.1 in /docs (#311) * 0c0ae15863c8e173a22ba093b36f5d00dce27adf chore: improve local pester test runs (#310) * b75f132e6be8537d2e28b2be44f68829b66aedc6 test: add logic apps integration tests (#308)

release.name: v1.6.1
release.body:
Install the Arcus.WebApi packages that you need via NuGet, for instance [Arcus.WebApi.Security](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Arcus.WebApi.Security/1.6.1):

## What's new?
### Fixes / Changes
* Re-add operation ID to HTTP response with HTTP correlation enabled (#365)
* Add missing telemetry context to support Azure Functions HTTP correlation tracking (#370)
* Use traces for diagnostic HTTP correlation messages (#372)

## Changes:

* 306fc33b7337afe7289f30d95d9f399390d26316 (❗) feat: add telemetry context to http client correlation options (#371)
* 2d4eeb34653ac65c154d9427d76a088a7d3c61e2 chore: update missing request id warning to trace (#372)
* 05b9cb06e175d57358594dc999ffdde5fae5ca1a feat: add operation id to http response (#367)
* dd00dbb978779510bb49aa1b7324d1c1c403089a chore: Bump terser from 4.8.0 to 4.8.1 in /docs (#364)
* ade9f6dca3aaff89a4377d33de4fabbd3b63b71c fix: update w correct sample package (#363)
* 51260d571091f81b3bb7da20e70ce707f27b3d31 docs: publish v1.6 feature docs (#362)

This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/codit/Arcus/_build/results?buildId=63717&view=logs).
